Text.Page:
The necromancers are uncovering piles of bones, and I'm afraid they're trying to mobilize skeleton soldiers.

Not exactly a fun job, but collect those skeleton piles, or we'll be fighting the same enemies over and over again.

We dodged an arrow, didn't we? I don't even want to imagine what might have happened if all these bones turned into soldiers.

Good job, !
Collect those skeleton bones before the necromancers turn them into soldiers!
